title: LF SILVER + PLAYERS FOR FLEX TEAM!!
body: looking for soild members for a flex team for the OOL comeing up THIS week must be silver+ have a working mic and also players must main the roles thay pick add me ingame also must be a active player add me in game Monstêr COPY PASTE MY NAME AND ADD ME{{champion:90}}

replies.body: yo, im keen, only bronze in flex but, in solo queue and 3v3 ranked I'm silver. I main mid and jg. Add me since i cant figure out how to add you. v aids is my summoner name.
